name: What Comes Next
description:
"wilbur... what happened to you? who are you?"

Ever since you awoke on the dimly lit train, forever moving, you had been dreaming about a nation blowing up. You relive an individual named 'Wilbur' die over and over again, and feel immense sadness for this supposed stranger.

That is why, when the train finally makes a stop, you take it as your sign to explore the foreign memory inside you.

_______________________________________________________________

This is a short fan-game for the DSMP that is primarily built because of two reasons: i had ideas about Wilbur's afterlife, and that I miss Technoblade and needed a way to pass the time.

This is built from my headcannons and some canonical information! If you disagree with my interpretation, pop off, but you can be respectful about it.

Gameplay: about 15 minutes

System: uh windows

Please refrain from playing this game if you have the following triggers:

  • Flashing Lights
  • Death Mentions
  • Blood (referenced and shown)
  • Bright colours
  • Explosions

Credits for some of the assets used:

  • [Menu Theme Version II] by One Man Symphony (https://onemansymphony.bandcamp.com/)
  • "Calm Synthesizer, B.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
  • Kanaya - L'Manburg Anthem [A Hallelujah Cover] (Piano Cover) by tastyForReal on Twitter (tastyForReal 💛 (@tastyFr) / Twitter) and Youtube (tastyForReal - YouTube)

Everything else is either made/produced by me, provided to me as a free asset with RPGmaker MV, or is under creative commons.

This game is for free, so please do not distribute it for profit. I'm just a fan-game maker ;; don't give me avoidable trouble over this.
